channel.title: Music – Led Zeppelin
channel.description: Recent content in Led Zeppelin on Music

item.title: Led Zeppelin - Stairway To Heaven
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: Jimmy Page, Robert Plant
KY: 2791 / KY: 7046

There’s a lady
who’s sure
All that
glitters is gold
And she’s buying a
stairway to heaven
When she gets
there she knows
If the stores
are all closed
With a word she can get
what she came for
Ooh— ooh—-
and she’s buying a
Stairway
to heaven
There’s a sign
on the wall
But she wants
to be sure
Cause you know
sometimes
Words have
two meanings
In a tree
by the brook
There’s a songbird
who sings
Sometimes all of our
thoughts are misgiven

Ooh it makes
me wonder
Ooh it makes
me wonder
There’s a feeling
I get
When I look
to the west
And my spirit is crying
for leaving
In my thoughts
I have seen
Rings of smoke
through the trees
And the voices of
those who stand looking
Ooh it makes
me wonder
Ooh it makes
me wonder
And it’s whispered
that soon
If we all call
the tune
Then the piper will
lead us to reason
And a new day will
dawn
For those
who stand long
And the forests
will echo with laughter

If there’s a
bustle in your
Hedgerow don’t
be alarmed now
It’s just a spring
clean for the May queen
Yes there are two
paths you can go by
but in the long run
there’s still time
to change the road
you’re on
And it makes
me wonder

Our head is
humming and it won’t go
In case you
don’t know
The piper’s calling
you to join him
Dear lady can you
hear the wind blow
And did you know
your stairway
Lies on the
whispering wind

And as we wind
on down the road
Our shadow’s taller
than our soul
There walks a lady
we all know
Who shines white light
and wants to show
How everything
still turns to gold
And if you
listen very hard
The turn will
come to you at last
When all are
one and one is all
To be a rock
and not to roll

And she’s buying
a stairway to heaven

It’s been
a long time
Since
I rock and rolled
It’s been a long time
since I did the stroll
Let me get it back
let me get it back
Let me get it back
baby where I come from
It’s been a long time
been a long time
Been a long
lonely lonely lonely
Lonely lonely time
yes it has
It’s been a long time
since the book of love
I can’t count
the tears of
A life with no love
carry me back
Carry me back
carry me back
Baby where I come from
oh—-
It’s been a long time
been a long time
Been a long
lonely lonely lonely
Lonely lonely time
oh- oh-

Oh seems so long
since we walked
In the moonlight
making vows
That just can’t
work right
Oh yeah
open your arms
Open your arms
open your arms
Baby let my love
come running in
It’s been a long time
been a long time
Been a long
lonely lonely lonely

yeah—
Yeah— yeah—
yeah—

oh yeah oh yeah

item.title: Led Zeppelin - Immigrant Song
item.description:
KY: 60609

Ah ah ah ah
Ah ah ah ah
I’ve come from the
land of the ice
and snow
From the midnight
sun where the
hot springs
flow Come
out of the cold
Would drive
our ships to
new lands
And fight the hoards
And sing
and cry
Valhalla
I am coming
Always sleep with the
flashing arc I’ll
only go where things
are worse than shown
Ah ah ah ah
Ah ah ah ah
I’ve come from the
land of the ice
and snow
From the midnight
sun where the
hot springs
flow Such a
feeling so green
The whispered
tales of
Thor Of how he’d
come in times of war
We are your
overlords
Always sleep with the
flashing arc I’ll
only go where things
are worse than shown
So now you’d better
stop And rebuild
all your ruins
For peace and trust
can win
the day
Despite of
all your losing
Ooooh oooh ooooh
Ooooh oooh ooooh
Ooooh oooh ooooh
Ooooh oooh ooooh
Ooooh oooh
ooooh

Babe babe babe
I’m gonna leave you
I said baby you know
I’m gonna leave you
I’m leave you
when the summertime
Leave you
when the Summer comes
A rolling leave you
when the summer
Comes along
baby baby baby baby
Baby baby baby baby
I don’t wanna
Leave you
I ain’t jokin’ woman
I got to ramble
ooh yeah baby baby
I believin’ we really
got to ramble
I can hear
it callin’ me
The way it used to do
I can hear
It callin’ me
back home-

leave you ooh baby
You know I’ve really
got to leave you
Ooh I can hear
it callin’ me
I said don’t you hear
it callin’ me
The way it used to do
ooh-

I know I know I know
I never never never
Never never gonna
leave your baby
But I got to go away
from this place
I’ve got to quit you
yeah ooh baby baby
Baby baby baby
baby baby ooh
Don’t you hear

Woman woman I know
I know it feels good
To have you back again
and I know that
One day baby
it’s really gonna grow
Yes it is we gonna go
walkin’ through
The park every day
come what may
Every day ooh
mama mama mama baby
I’m gonna leave you
go away ooh baby
It was really
really good
You made me happy
every single day
But now I’ve got to
go away ooh

that’s when

When it’s callin’ me
back home-

the way you move

gonna make you groove

you shake that thing

gonna make you sting

when you walk that way
Watch your honey
drip can’t keep away

oh oh oh
